main event: A ground visual UFO sighting was reported in Pittsfield, Maine on April 23, 1954, with a total observation time of 4 minutes.
interesting points: The reported UFO was described as saucer-shaped, about the size of a silver dollar, silver in color, with a dome on top emitting a flashing, brilliant light.
Witnesses reported a swarm of bees-like noise and a whirling and cooling effect beneath the path of the object.
There were also reports of movement of stones on the ground and unusual sounds accompanying the sighting.
The observation was made on a clear day by reliable witnesses.
The report indicated that there was no photographic evidence or physical evidence found.
sighted object: unidentified saucer-shaped object emitting flashing light
